mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM uw_view WHERE phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(id, cont_id, role_code, name, userid, password, phone, useyn, write_time, ismanager, last_update_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{cont_id}, #{role_code}, #{name}, #{userid}, #{password}, #{phone}, 'Y', NOW(), 0, NOW())
INSERT INTO WORKER(site_id, cont_id, phone, gubun, name, jumin, t_id, delyn, last_update_time) VALUES(#{site_id}, #{cont_id}, #{phone}, #{gubun}, #{name}, #{jumin}, #{t_id}, 'N', NOW())
